ns0:entry.ns0:title: Asymmetric Hat Game with three players and three colors
ns0:entry.ns0:summary: Winning probabilities of The Hat Game (Ebert's Hat Problem) with three players and three colors are only known in the symmetric case: all probabilities of the colors are equal. This paper solves the asymmetric case: probabilities may be different. We find winning probabilies and optimal strategies in all cases.
ns0:entry.ns1:comment: it is now part of arXiv:1612.00276 (Ebert's asymmetric Hat Game)
